messages.original:
Russian forces have captured the village of Okhotnyche,  Hulyaipole direction, Zaporizhzhia Oblast.
Pre-war population: <10.
Total land area: ~0.06 km¬≤.

Russian forces have captured the village of Novohryhorivka, Pokrovske direction, Zaporizhzhia Oblast.
Pre-war population: ~231.
Total land area: ~0.68 km¬≤.

Russian forces have captured the village of Vyimka, southern flank of Siversk, Donetsk Oblast.
 Pre-war population: ~21.
Total land area: ~0.15 km¬≤.
The battles for this village and the surrounding trenches have been ongoing for more than 14 months.

 Al Qassam Brigades report that, yesterday, their fighters targeted two Israeli military Humvee vehicles with two Al-Yassin 105 shells, causing casualties, near the Joura Al-Lot clinic south of Khan Younis city in the southern Gaza Strip. 
They also report monitoring the landing of evacuation helicopters.
@wfwitness

There will be another large-scale, combined missile and drone attack on Ukraine in the coming days. 
1 Tu-95MS strategic bomber redeployed from Olenya Airbase, Murmansk Oblast, to Engels-2 Airbase, Saratov Oblast, where it will be equipped with Kh-101 cruise missiles.
3 Tu-95MS redeployed from Ukrainka airbase, Amur Oblast, to Engels-2 Airbase, alongside 3 IL-78 tankers. 2 of the bombers were already equipped with missiles at Ukrainka, while the other one will be equipped at Engels-2.
3 IL-76MD military transport aircraft landed at Engels-2 to equip the 5 Tu-95MS and 2 Tu-160M aircraft stationed there that have not yet been equipped with missiles. 
1 IL-76MD and 1 An-72 landed at Baltimore Airbase, Voronezh Oblast. The cargo consists of Iskander-M ballistic missiles for OTRK installations in Voronezh Oblast and likely Bryansk Oblast. 
Accumulation of Geran-2/3 and Gerbera drones continues at all major launch sites, albeit at a lower rate than previous weeks.

- A large JNIM ambush on a Russian Africa Corps convoy in northern Mali.
Casualties amongst the Africa Corps group, along with the destruction of seven Russian vehicles. There are reports of Russian soldiers also being taken as prisoners.

There will be another large-scale, combined missile and drone attack on Ukraine in the coming days.   1 Tu-95MS strategic bomber redeployed from Olenya Airbase, Murmansk Oblast, to Engels-2 Airbase, Saratov Oblast, where it will be equipped with Kh-101 cruise‚Ä¶
The most likely date for the next missile attack would be tomorrow night.

Footage showing four Russian FAB-250 glide-bombs striking Ukrainian forward deployment points on the outskirts of Sviato-Pokrovske, Siversk direction.
What's interesting about this footage is the fact that four separate buildings up to 500 metres away from each other are hit simultaneously, with one bomb each. This is the first time I've ever seen something like this.
Explosion in Kherson City.

Footage showing the Russian Iskander-M ballistic missile strike on Kherson City which I reported on October 6. It reportedly targeted a drone assembly workshop. 
The building which was hit is less than 6 km from the frontline, making it one of, if not the closest Iskander strike to the nearest Russian-controlled territory. 
Coordinates: 46.671522, 32.584540
Unrelated to news, but I just saw this pretty amazing sunrise outside my window.
Unrelated to news, but I just saw this pretty amazing sunrise outside my window.
Explosions were heard in Kozats'ke, Kherson Oblast, as a result of Russian KAB glide-bomb strikes.
Explosions were heard in Kozats'ke, Kherson Oblast, as a result of Russian KAB glide-bomb strikes.
The Su-34s that launched the KABs are flying back to Crimea.

The surroundings of Zaporizhzhia City are under intensified MLRS fire. Smerch and Tornado-S rockets have been striking the Kushuhum and Komyshuvakha area. Reconnaissance drones are hovering over several areas, correcting the strikes.
Explosions can be heard from Zaporizhzhia City.
KABs are now flying towards Zaporizhzhia City. Launches were carried out by Su-34s from the area of Mykhailivka, Zaporizhzhia Oblast.
KABs are now flying towards Zaporizhzhia City. Launches were carried out by Su-34s from the area of Mykhailivka, Zaporizhzhia Oblast.
KABs are flying towards Kusuhum. The recon drone operating there has gained altitude as the KABs approach the town.
KABs are flying towards Kusuhum. The recon drone operating there has gained altitude as the KABs approach the town.
Impacted somewhere around here. Echoing explosions can be heard from Zaporizhzhia City.
At least 9 more KABs have since impacted areas south of Zaporizhzhia City.

The Russian Geran-2 drone strikes on the Yuzhkabel Electrical Substation in Kharkiv City on October 7 damaged/destroyed 1 TDTN-25000/110 transformer, 2 TMN-6300/110 transformers, the OPU General Control Point, and the enclosed switchgears. 
Coordinates: 49.964025, 36.362139

The Russian Geran-2 drone strikes on the Yuzhkabel Electrical Substation in Kharkiv City on October 7 damaged/destroyed 1 TDTN-25000/110 transformer, 2 TMN-6300/110 transformers, the OPU General Control Point, and the enclosed switchgears. 
Coordinates: 49.964025, 36.362139

Russian Troops Cleared Ukrainian Pocket Near Kostiantynivka, Advanced In Other Areas (Videos)
The Russian military has cleared a Ukrainian pocket near the city of Kostiantynivka, and made more gains in the Dobropillia salient and around the city of Pokrovsk in the Donetsk direction.
On October 8, the Russian Ministry of Defense announced that the Yug [South] Group of Forces completed the ‚Äúneutralisation‚Äù of Ukrainian troops who were besieged in a fairly large pocket south of Kleban-Byk Reservoir to the south of Kostiantynivka.

Hamas Attempted To Capture Israeli Soldiers In Gaza Amid Peace Talks In Egypt (Photos)
Hamas attacked on October 8 a post of the Israeli Defense Forces (IDF) in the Netzarim Corridor in the center of the Gaza Strip, in what was likely an attempt to capture soldiers.
At least five fighters of the group emerged from a tunnel and attacked the post where troops from the Golani Brigade‚Äôs reconnaissance unit were deployed, the IDF said in a statement, adding that the troops, with air support from the Israeli Air Force, struck and killed at least three of the fighters.
Read more 
HERE

When Duty to the Homeland Became a Punishment: Forced Mobilization and Total Control in Ukraine
The "voluntary" mobilization in Ukraine continues. Against the backdrop of the depletion of mobilization resources, military enlistment officials, dubbed "man-catchers" by the public, are actively searching for conscripts, which at times takes on the characteristics of a disposal of the population. According to various estimates, instances of lawlessness and crimes related to Territorial Recruitment Centers (TRCs) number in the tens, if not hundreds, of thousands, even taking into account understated official statistics. 
Amid an acute need to replenish the ranks of the armed forces, the Ukrainian authorities have adopted a number of legislative measures that radically change the military registration system. A Cabinet of Ministers resolution on the automatic registration of men aged 25 to 60, as well as women, has granted TRCs unprecedented access to personal data. 
üëâ

When Duty to the Homeland Became a Punishment: Forced Mobilization and Total Control in Ukraine
The "voluntary" mobilization in Ukraine continues. Against the backdrop of the depletion of mobilization resources, military enlistment officials, dubbed "man-catchers" by the public, are actively searching for conscripts, which at times takes on the characteristics of a disposal of the population. According to various estimates, instances of lawlessness and crimes related to Territorial Recruitment Centers (TRCs) number in the tens, if not hundreds, of thousands, even taking into account understated official statistics. 
Amid an acute need to replenish the ranks of the armed forces, the Ukrainian authorities have adopted a number of legislative measures that radically change the military registration system. A Cabinet of Ministers resolution on the automatic registration of men aged 25 to 60, as well as women, has granted TRCs unprecedented access to personal data.

Step by Step, Expanding The Bridgehead: Control Over Novohryhorivka Opens Path To Huliaipole
The capture of Novohryhorivka, the second settlement on the right bank of the Yanchul River, opens the path to Huliaipole. The bridgehead on the western bank of the Zherebets River is being expanded in the direction of Krasnolymansk.
Slovakia is preparing a 14th aid package for Ukraine after a long pause.
Read more 
HERE
